name: OpenPlansUnpack
description: Unpack projects data from open plans.

inputParameters.name: OpenPlansData
inputParameters.description: Open Plans data in the form of an dict or class instance.

outputParameters.name: properties
outputParameters.description: Property values from open plans data (readable by Grasshopper in tree structure).

outputParameters.name: keys
outputParameters.description: Keys from open plans data input.
